text: whla hin dkhalt hdyqtk faejbtk hamidt allh, wqlt: hdha ma sha' allah ly, la quat li ealaa thsylh 'iilaa ballh. 'iin kunt tarani 'aqala mink malana wawladana, faeasaa rabiy 'an yetyny 'afdal min hdyqtk, wyslbk alnaemat bkfrk, wayursil ealaa hdyqtk eadhabana min alsma', fatusbih ardana mlsa' jrda' la tuthbit ealayha qdm, wala yunbit fiha nbat, 'aw yasir mawuha aldhy tusqa minh ghayrana fi alard, fala tuqadar ealaa 'ikhrajh
